Package org.neo4j.consistency.checking.cache

Interface CacheAccess.Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCacheAccess.DefaultClient
    Enclosing interface:
    CacheAccess
    public static interface CacheAccess.Client
    Client per thread for accessing cache and counts for statistics

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearCache​(long id)
      Clears the cached values for the specified id.
      boolean getBooleanFromCache​(long id, int slot)
      Gets a cached value, put there with putToCache(long, long...) or putToCacheSingle(long, int, long) and interpret field value as a boolean. 0 will be treated as false all the rest as true.
      long getFromCache​(long id, int slot)
      Gets a cached value, put there with putToCache(long, long...) or putToCacheSingle(long, int, long).
      Iterable<PropertyRecord> getPropertiesFromCache()  
      PropertyRecord getPropertyFromCache​(long id)
      Gets a cached PropertyRecord of a specific id, see putPropertiesToCache(Collection).
      void incAndGetCount​(Counts.Type type)
      Increases the count of the specified type, for gathering statistics during a run.
      void putPropertiesToCache​(Collection<PropertyRecord> properties)
      Caches a Collection of PropertyRecord for later checking.
      void putToCache​(long id, long... cacheFields)
      Caches all values for an id, i.e. fills all slots.
      void putToCacheSingle​(long id, int slot, long value)
      Caches a single value for an id and slot.
      boolean withinBounds​(long id)
      Some consistency check stages splits the id range into segments, one per thread.

    • Method Detail

      • getFromCache

        long getFromCache​(long id,
                  int slot)
        Gets a cached value, put there with putToCache(long, long...) or putToCacheSingle(long, int, long).
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id this cached value is tied to.
        slot - which cache slot for this id.
        Returns:
        the cached value.

      • getBooleanFromCache

        boolean getBooleanFromCache​(long id,
                            int slot)
        Gets a cached value, put there with putToCache(long, long...) or putToCacheSingle(long, int, long) and interpret field value as a boolean. 0 will be treated as false all the rest as true.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id this cached value is tied to.
        slot - which cache slot for this id.
        Returns:
        false if slot value is 0, true otherwise.

      • putToCache

        void putToCache​(long id,
                long... cacheFields)
        Caches all values for an id, i.e. fills all slots.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id these cached values will be tied to.
        cacheFields - the values to cache, one per slot.

      • putToCacheSingle

        void putToCacheSingle​(long id,
                      int slot,
                      long value)
        Caches a single value for an id and slot.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id this cached values will be tied to.
        slot - the slot for the given id.
        value - the value to cache for this id and slot.

      • clearCache

        void clearCache​(long id)
        Clears the cached values for the specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id to clear the cached values for.

      • putPropertiesToCache

        void putPropertiesToCache​(Collection<PropertyRecord> properties)
        Caches a Collection of PropertyRecord for later checking.
        Parameters:
        properties - property records to cache for this thread.

      • getPropertyFromCache

        PropertyRecord getPropertyFromCache​(long id)
        Gets a cached PropertyRecord of a specific id, see putPropertiesToCache(Collection).
        Parameters:
        id - the property record id to look for.
        Returns:
        cached PropertyRecord id, or null if not found.

      • getPropertiesFromCache

        Iterable<PropertyRecord> getPropertiesFromCache()
        Returns:
        cached properties.

      • incAndGetCount

        void incAndGetCount​(Counts.Type type)
        Increases the count of the specified type, for gathering statistics during a run.
        Parameters:
        type - counts type.

      • withinBounds

        boolean withinBounds​(long id)
        Some consistency check stages splits the id range into segments, one per thread. That split is initiated by CacheAccess.prepareForProcessingOfSingleStore(long) and checker, per thread, using this method.
        Parameters:
        id - the record id to check whether or not to process for this thread.
        Returns:
        true if the thread represented by this client should process the record of the given id, otherwise false.
